name: crg-demo-crm
description: Demo CRM application for CRG (Conversational Product Intelligence) - includes React frontend and Hono API backend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "api,web" -c "yellow,cyan" "npm run dev -w crm-api" "npm run dev -w crm"
scripts.build: npm run build -w crm-api && npm run build -w crm
scripts.test: npm run test -w crm-api && npm run test -w crm
